testcase.name: test

error.message:
### Error updating database. Cause: java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: ORA-00001: 무결성 제약 조건(UMS.PK_INVOICEHEADER)에 위배됩니다
### The error may exist in file [D:\sts4Works\springsecurity\target\classes\mapper\oracle\productMapper.xml] ### The error may involve com.magicoh.springmvc.dao.IProductMapperDao.insertInvoiceHeader-Inline ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: INSERT INTO INVOICEHEADER( INVOICE_ID, CLIENT_ID, INVOICE_DATE, SHIPPING_ADDRESS, TOTAL_AMT, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_DATE) VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE) ### Cause: java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: ORA-00001: 무결성 제약 조건(UMS.PK_INVOICEHEADER)에 위배됩니다
; SQL []; ORA-00001: 무결성 제약 조건(UMS.PK_INVOICEHEADER)에 위배됩니다 ; nested exception is java.sql.SQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: ORA-00001: 무결성 제약 조건(UMS.PK_INVOICEHEADER)에 위배됩니다
